reviews.text:
Barren station that is a bit far from the centre, but does have some information boards and cover.

Both stairs and a ramp to reach the platform so is accessible for wheelchairs/pushchairs

This station is way too far out of town, in all our years of travelling this must be one of the farthest away stations from the town it is serving. Sporadic bus service and on the day that we went to Gainsborough, it was the hottest day of the year and our train was cancelled.
very run down and intimidating when dark
No ticket office but there was a help and information board. A lovely train line.Great service on the train. Ticket collector very helpful 😊

Just a platform. There isn't any ticket facilities and the station is not close enough to town. Overall to a visitor, it is very shabby and looks like a disused station. Unstaffed, and if any station needs it this one does. You would be better off driving to Retford if going on East Coast Line.
